body:
Hi Greg,


Sorry, seems in trying to catch up with work, I'm writing emails in 
haste.  I meant to refer to the falsecolor option for using the original 
color scale.  In the other distributions I've used it was the "-spec" 
option. 


Thanks.


~Chris
